alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Hale; Marengo; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:24PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Marengo, southwestern Perry, southwestern Hale and southwestern Dallas Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 424 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greensboro Municipal Airport to near Orrville. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selma, Demopolis, Linden, Uniontown, Thomaston, Orrville, Newbern, Faunsdale, Dayton, Bogue Chitto, Vaiden, Consul, Central Mills, Arcola, Old Cahaba Park, Dannelly Reservoir, Freddie Jones Field, Belknap, Dallas Lake and Marion Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
